summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2830 for the improvement of Sixth Avenue Northwest from West Fifty-fifth Street to West Sixty-fifth Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of concrete sidewalks with the necessary wooden cross walks and providing for the surface drainage where necessary, under Ordinance No. 33962, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
